GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article when provided its id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments on a requested article

exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment and serves newly posted comment

article.title: Another article about Mitch
article.author: butter_bridge
article.body: There will never be enough articles about Mitch!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment when provided its id
